## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and files generated by popular extensions.

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Mono crash logs
mono_crash.*

# Build results
[Dd]ebug/
[Dd]ebugPublic/
[Rr]elease/
[Rr]eleases/
x64/
x86/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]64/
bld/
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
[Ll]og/
[Ll]ogs/

# IDE-specific
.vs/
.vscode/
.idea/

# Visual Studio for Mac
*.userprefs

# Build artifacts
project.lock.json
project.fragment.lock.json
artifacts/

# ASP.NET Scaffolding
ScaffoldingReadMe.txt

# NuGet
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
*.nuspec
*.psmdcp
packages/
*.nuget.props
*.nuget.targets

# Azure
csx/
*.build.csdef

# Store app packages
AppPackages/
BundleArtifacts/
Package.StoreAssociation.xml
_pkginfo.txt

# DB / backups
*.dbmdl
*.bak
*.backup
*.ldf
*.mdf

# IIS Express
iisexpress/

# Publish output
publish/
[Pp]ublished/
*.pubxml
*.publishproj

# Blazor-specific static assets
wwwroot/*.gz
wwwroot/*.br
wwwroot/*.map

# Node (for Blazor WASM)
node_modules/
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
package-lock.json
pnpm-lock.yaml

# Environment & secrets
.env
.env.*
secrets.json

# ReSharper
_ReSharper*/
*.[Rr]e[Ss]harper
*.DotSettings.user

# Logs & reports
*.svclog
*.scc
*.tlog
*.wrn
*.err

# Rider plugin caches
*.sln.iml
